name: Verify that the generic search function works with special characters.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as an agency user with relevant permissions.
When :
  • One the booking request > manager requests page. 
Then :
  • User should be able to search in the generic search field using special characters.
  • Search can include date format :'xx/xx/xxxx'.

name: Verify that the total and generic search function work when searching for values in the total column of the table.
folder: Bug Tickets/UNO-2003 Search Function on the create view adjustments page
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a client user with create / view adjustments permissions 
Then :
  • On the create view adjustments page. 
When :
  • The user should be able to search the total column values in the above specific search function.
  • and also in the advance generic search function.

name: Verify that an agency worker (Vennue) cant view the reports submenu on the side navigation.
testScript:
Given :
  •  Logged in as and agency user
When :
  • Viewing the side navigation bar on the website. 
Then :
  • The user should not see an option for the reports page.

name: UNO2072  , UNO 2074 Verify the Authorization Step Addition
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as user with 'approve booking' permissions, 
When :
  • The user has approved the booking. 
Then :
  • The booking need to be authorized before it can be sent to the client .

name: UNO2072, UNO 2075 Verify The  User Permissions for Authorization -  user has permissions
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a user with  the authorize bookings permission.
When :
  • Authorizing bookings 
Then :
  • User is allowed to authorize the approved bookings.

name: UNO2072, UNO 2075 Verify The  User Permissions for Authorization -  user Does NOT have permissions.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a user without  the 'authorize bookings' permission.
When :
  • Authorizing bookings 
Then :
  • User is NOT allowed to authorize the approved bookings.

name: UNO2072  , UNO 2074 Verify the Authorization Step Addition - User does Not have permission
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as user without 'approve booking' permissions, 
When :
  • On the booking page 
Then :
  • The user is not able to authorize the booking or action it.

name: UNO2072,  UNO 2076 - Verify the booking process following authorization.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on a a user with Approve bookings permission 
When :
  • The booking has been approved 
Then :
  • The booking should be sent to the client for action as normal 
  • The rest of the steps are unchanged.

name: UNO2072, UNO2077 Verify that the status of the booking updates / reflexes its current status.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a user with authorize bookings permissions 
When :
  • Creating a booking and and approving, authorizing and completing the life cycle of the booking 
Then :
  • The status of the booking on the booking management page reflects the current status of the booking throughout the process.

name: UNO2072, Uno2078 Verify edit restriction on completed bookings.
testScript:
Given :
  • When logged on as a user with authorize bookings permissions.
When :
  • On the booking request > manage bookings > complete page.
  • Select a completed booking.
Then :
  • Only the number of workers can be increased or decreased,
  • This sets the booking back to pending status.

name: UNO2072, UNO2081 Verify that the notifications and Alerts are working as expected.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a user with approve booking permissions.
When :
  • A booking is set to approved.
Then :
  • An email notification is sent to  user with authorization permissions so that the booking can be actioned.

When :

  • Check that that list is only showing the works that are assigned to that agency.

name: Verify that the Export button exports all the columns currently displays on screen.
testScript:

  • Logged in as a user with view agency works permissions
When :
  • On the agency workers page.
Then :
  • Select a agency
  • Click on the export button

  • Open the file and cross check the column name with the ones displaying on the screen.

name: Verify that the Export button exports all the rows currently displays on screen.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a user with view agency works permissions
When :
  • On the agency workers page.
Then :
  • Select a agency
  • Filter the results using the advanced search option. 
  • Click on the export button 
  • The file is exported 
  • Open the file and cross check the data in the row with what is displaying on the screen.

name: Verify that the 'Previous' and 'Next' navigation buttons work.

Then :

name: Add Employee Documents - Creating new worker
testScript:
Click on Manage worker details
Add New worker
Click Create Worker and add documents or Save Worker and edit documents
Add Employee Documents

name: Add Employee Documents - Editing worker
testScript:
Click on Manage worker details
Edit Worker
Click Create Worker and add documents or Save Worker and edit documents
Add Employee Documents

name: Add Employee Documents Page
testScript:
Page to contain
  •   Please upload scanned copies of below documents:
  • Select document type dropdown
    • Dropdown to load with all the default documents set in the documents administration page
    • Dropdown to also include client-specific documents set in the documents administration page - for the clients the agency is linked to.
  • Expiry Date
    • Date picker to choose a date
    • Not a mandatory field
    • Allow Null entries (Expiry date is irrelevant for some document types)
  •  Drop or click to upload documents here
    • Dropbox for documents
    • Specify the allowed formats and size of the document at the bottom of the Dropbox as shown on the mockup
    • Allow drag and drop or click through to choose documents to upload
  • Upload button
    • Click
    • The document is uploaded and shown in the table below

name: Error Messages
testScript:
• Upload clicked without choosing document type ‘please select document type’ displayed.
  • Upload clicked with a document that does not match with the specified formats ‘document filetype not supported’ is displayed
  • Upload clicked with a document that exceeds the specified size ‘File too large for upload’ displayed
  • Upload clicked without a document in the drop box ‘Please choose a file to upload’ is displayed
  • Upload clicked with a document type that already exists on the table ‘Document already exist – Do you want to replace the existing document’ displayed in a pop-up window
    • Yes Button
      • Clicked - Document replaced – window closed
    • No Button
      • Clicked – window closed

name: Existing Employee Documents table - Settings
testScript:
• Table to have a search box at the top
  • Table to have pagination at the bottom
  • Page numbers to be clickable, and arrows to move forward and backward by the user
  • Table to have select page size drop-down at the bottom with 10,20,50 and 100 options
  • When page size is selected table should show the appropriate number of rows based on the selection
  • The bottom of the table shows the total number of items on current pages vs the overall total number of items (EG Showing 10 of 100 entries), in the right corner

name: Existing Employee Documents table
testScript:
Table columns
  • Document type
    • Document type selected when uploading is displayed
  • Document Name
    • Document File Name is displayed
  • Expiry Date
    • Expiry date selected when uploading is displayed
  • Uploaded On
    • Display date document was uploaded
  • Action
    • Delete icon displayed
      • Clicked – ‘Are you sure you want to delete the document’ displayed in a pop-up window
      • Yes Button
        • Clicked – Document Deleted– window closed
      • No Button
        • Clicked – window closed

name: Logged in as a Client User
testScript:
• View Worker Documents
  • Select Agency
  • Documents – View
  • Window displaying List of default documents plus the client-specific documents with upload details displayed.
  • There are no changes to this window – except the list of documents shown will now change dynamically based on client viewing the documents - linked to client-specific documents defined in the documents maintenance page
  • Also add a new column Mandatory and show whether the document type was specified as mandatory in the documents maintenance page
